text: wan 'aqim -ayha alrswl- nafsak ealaa din al'islam mstqymana ealayh ghyr mayl eanh 'iilaa yahudiat wala nsranyt wala eibadat ghyrh, wala takunana mmn yushrik fi eibadat rabih alalihat walandad, fatakun min alhalkyn. whdha wa'iin kan khtabana llrswl salaa allah ealayh wsllam fa'iinah mwjjah lemwm alamt
